text: Shanxi Lu'an Environmental Energy is a Chinese listed company based in Changzhi engaged in the mining, processing, and distribution of coal. Chiefly, the company produces for sale coke and refined coal.https://www.reuters.com/finance/stocks/companyProfile?symbol=601699.SS Reuters ==References== Category:Coal companies of China Category:Companies based in Shanxi Category:Changzhi Category:Companies listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange
title: Shanxi Lu'an Environmental Energy
